description: Try our easy to follow Mexican Vegetable Stew (Posole) with Mushrooms & Hominy recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mexican Vegetable Stew (Posole) with Mushrooms & Hominy Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 tbs dried ground New Mexico chilli powder
425g hominy, or sweet corn, rinsed and drained
1 courgette, trimmed, quartered lengthways, and cut into 1cm chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a large, deep-sided pan or stockpot over a medium–highheat. Add the onion and cook, stirring frequently and adjusting the heat as necessary, for 5 minutes.
Stir in the carrots and mushrooms, and cook for 5 minutes.
Add the garlic and stir for 1 minute.
Sprinkle the chilli powder, cumin, salt, and oregano over the vegetable mixture and stir for 30 seconds.
Add the vegetable stock, bring to a simmer, and cook for 5 minutes.
Add the hominy or sweetcorn and courgette, bring to the boil, reduce the heatto medium–low, and cook for 10 minutes.
Remove from the heat, stir in the lime juice and coriander and serve.
